home.parrafo-info: I am currently studying Software Development, I am a lover of programming with the objective of creating projects that give the best quality of interaction to the user.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
I am a student in the BYU-IDAHO study program, where I am pursuing a bachelor's degree in Software Engineering.
My fascination with programming goes beyond mere code writing; I enjoy transforming ideas into practical and functional solutions. I love the challenges presented by the world of software engineering, as each problem is an opportunity to learn something new and enhance my skills. Tranquility is my creative ally, and I find inspiration in serene environments to fuel my creativity. I am committed to continuous development and eagerly look forward to contributing to the world of technology with innovative and efficient solutions.
